sub_title: Chair @ UNICEF STR | President @ EDS | Erasmian
summary:
I am currently studying Public Administration Science at Erasmus University Rotterdam, which is one of the Top 4 Public Administration Schools in the world.  

I aspire to operate as a Policy Analyst in the field of International Relations with a data-centric and qualitative specialization in International Trade Investment Law and International Development Advisory with a focus on ESG Consulting, Capital Markets and Institutional Economics.

I am highly adept at Debate, Model UN, Public Speaking, Content Writing, Graphic Designing, Academic and Market Research, Event Hosting, Organisation, Management and Leadership with experiences of working in Finance, Banking, Marketing, Public Policy, Public Relations, Management and Tech Consulting, Sustainability Management, Academia, Journalism, and Non Profit Management.

I also love Movies, TV Shows, Football, Basketball, F1, Cooking and Travelling!

treasury_media.title: UNICEF Student Team Rotterdam
treasury_media.description: Became the Chair of the UNICEF Student Team of the biggest port city of Europe, functioning alongside the UNICEF National Board of the Kingdom of the Netherlands!

treasury_media.title: Erasmus Rotterdam Open 2023
treasury_media.description: Organized the biggest debate tournament in the Netherlands on the 6-7th of May, 2023.

treasury_media.title: Erasmus Novice Cup 2023
treasury_media.description: Organized the biggest Debate Tournament for Novice Debaters in the booming port city of Rotterdam, with the Erasmus Debating Society on the 4th of February, 2023.

treasury_media.title: Erasmus 84 Hour Film Festival
treasury_media.description: Placed as a Top 3 Team in the 84 Hour Film Festival at the Erasmus Paviljoen, hosted by the Erasmus University Rotterdam

treasury_media.title: Tilburg Open 2023
treasury_media.description: Ended up as a Finalist in one of the biggest debate tournaments in Europe!

treasury_media.description: Hosted a Webinar with Honourable Member of Parliament Barrister Shameem Haider Patwary sir to discuss the Official Secrets Act in Bangladesh with the Youth Policy Forum

treasury_media.title: Persero SWOT Analysis
treasury_media.description: Contructed a SWOT Analysis Project and a Presentation for the Indonesian Electricity Giant Persero for our Organisation and Management Class

awards.title: Represented Erasmus Debating Society at the European Universities Debating Championships 2023
awards.description:
Represented EDS A, as a Debater and the President of the Erasmus Debating Society at the EUDC 2023, held at Burgas,Bulgaria.
EUDC 2023 is the premier tournament of the best debaters of Europe!

awards.title: Best Delegate of Economic and Social Council
3rd Best Novice Speaker
awards.description: Placed 3rd Best Novice Speaker in a tournament with 100+ debaters

awards.title: 8th Best Team
awards.description: Placed 8th and broke into the Open Category as a Novice Team in a tournament with 64 Teams. Competed against Teams such as those from University of Oxford, and defeated teams from University of Cambridge and Amherst College

awards.title: Selected as a Debater for Dutch Debating League 2023
awards.description: Represented EDS 2 as a part of the premier Debating Competition of the Netherlands exclusively for the best debaters in the Netherlands.

awards.title: Selected for the EUR Buddy Program 2023
awards.description: I have been selected as a Buddy for the EUR Buddy Program where I take the responsibility of guiding and helping first year students acclimate into the EUR environment and the city of Rotterdam!

awards.title: Best Delegate of Arab League General Assembly
Vice President of United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime
Rapporteur of Futuristic United Nations Security Council

projects.title: Academic Skills Project on Bangladesh: Globalization and Rising Power Purview
projects.description: -Presentation and Project on the People’s Republic of Bangladesh with a situational analysis on the economic, socio-political, geographic, and cultural situation with an empirical focus on Globalization as a scientific dynamic and rising power theories.

projects.title: Education Inequality Literature Review Project
projects.description:
-Conducted Secondary Research on Education Inequality Clusters and Demographics in Europe and North America
-Extrapolated Data pertaining to the Inequality Disparity in the United States of America
-Produced a 3,000 Word Literature Review explaining the mechanisms and evaluative analysis of the research in the status-quo
